Message.Title: E*Trade Layoffs Last Week
Message.Msg: Last week ETrade quietly layed off a small percentage of employees at multiple locations. Odd that that nobody picked up on this.

Message.Title: E-Trade buyout inevitable
Message.Msg: All the signs point to a E-Trade buyout. They are trimming expenses, repairing balance sheet by rolling over expensive debt into more reasonable rates. I would not be surprised if E-Trade is acquired before the year end.
Why didn't they sell out when they conducted the review?
I don't think the offers were very compelling back then. Financial sector is in much better shape now - I think there is a real chance for a 40-50% premium now.
JEF got taken out today with a whopping 12% premium so far in trading. That company is way cleaner than etrade.

Message.Title: Lonesome In NJ
Message.Msg: Dear Abby, A handsome man mad love to me for one day. He told me he cared. I have not seen or heard from him in two weeks. Everyone says he is a self-centered liar. They say he is playing golf. Was I a fool? sincerely, Fatso

JEF was not clean - have you heard of MF Global? JEF deal was done at such a low premium because management gets to keep their job at the new outfit. That is certainly not the case at E-Trade which has a board director as interim CEO basically in place to shop the firm.

**the problrem with your reply is that the good general Petraeus was not fired, rather he quit of his own accord ** Here is what really happened... "Genral Petraeus for not coming forward to after the election I won't fire you, instead you can resign, OK?" Obama. "You betcha, btw, it was worth it...you ought to try it some time married to that beast." Petraeus

No real reason to refi the debt if a buyout was even being talked about right now. Aside from that, the short interest has been increasing each period for quite some time. Not exactly what you see when a buyout is around the corner.

Message.Title: Once again, buckwheat was the only one who had no clue
Message.Msg: Ambassador Stevens begged the state Department for protection months before he was murdered. Nobody bothered to find out which Hollywood starlet or golf course Obama was on, and let him know. Rep. Dave Reichert (R-Wash.) confirmed Sunday he first learned of the affair several months ago from a friend who knows Kelley. Reichert told House Majority Leader Eric Cantor (R-Va.), who put Kelley in touch with FBI Director Robert Mueller. But poor little Barry knew nothing.

Topic.Title: Once again, buckwheat was the only one who had no clue

Message.Msg: earthling, there are 3 logical possibilities 1. he lacks intellectual curiosity 2. the knowledgeable humans in your government do not respect him enough to inform him of these matters. 3. he fails to give a schitt. In any case, this creature is approximately 5.1412216 light years from being acceptable.
